name: Knight Errant

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally DEF in Dungeons by 32%.

skills.name: Half-Sword
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a [Leech] debuff for 2 turns. Will ignore 30% of the target's DEF.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.name: Mordhau
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 60% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn. Resets the cooldowns on each of this Champion's skills if the target is killed.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Death Warrant
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 60% chance of placing a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns. Damage is increased by 75% if this Champion has full HP.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +20%
